Geboren: (1820-12-18) Desember 18, 1820, (13 Tevet 5581 Anno Mundi), Pressburg, Oostenrykse imperium, nou Bratislava, Slovakië
Gestorven: Mar 26, 1883(1883-03-26) (jaar 62), (17 Adar II 5643 Anno Mundi), Krakow, Oost- Hongaryë, nou Poolland
Ander name: Rabbi Simon Schreiber, die Michtav Sofer
Kinderen: Akiva, Yisrael David Simcha (Bunim), Yoel, Shlomo Aleksandri, Asher, Raizel (Kornitzer), Shulamit (Roth)
